H0.text: In 1902 which food company started production in a disused malthouse in Burton-on-Trent. Bass Brewery

H1.text: In 1902 which food company started production in a disused malthouse in Burton-on-Trent. Burton Ale Company

H2.text: In 1902 which food company started production in a disused malthouse in Burton-on-Trent. Midlands Malt Company

H3.text: In 1902 which food company started production in a disused malthouse in Burton-on-Trent. MARMITE

A4.text: The Marmite Food Extract Company was formed in 1902 in Burton upon Trent, Staffordshire, England with Marmite as its main product and Burton as the site of the first factory.
